backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining an unused backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend UI and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining the medical/AI color system, dark mode tokens, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and mounting point for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering hero, overview, pipeline, and FAQ sections with a medical deep-learning theme.
frontend/src/components/site/FAQAccordio: FAQ accordion built with shadcn/ui providing expandable research and clinical explanations.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, quick links, owner info, and attribution with a medical-themed layout.
frontend/src/components/site/PipelineTab: Renders a tabbed UI with sections for preprocessing, model, and evaluation, each containing descriptive content and icons.
Implements a responsive site header with smooth-scrolling navigation, scroll-based styling, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, typography, backgrounds, and utility classes for animations and accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color mappings to CSS vars, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, required images, and a list of existing features for building an interactive website about heart disease classification. Contains project versioning, notes, and image asset requirements.
